metadata.title: CVE-2016-6173 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: NSD before 4.1.11 allows remote DNS master servers to cause a denial ofservice (/tmp disk consumption and slave server crash) via a zone transferwith unlimited data.

criterions.comment: nsd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
